context: Hello! How are you today? What kind of movies are you into?
I'm into a little bit of everything to be honest.
I am, too. Have you seen the Black Panther (2018) movie? It's out to stream now, I believe.
No I haven't seen it yet, but I really want to. I haven't been to see anything in theater in a long time.
resp: Have you seen Solo (2008) ? I want to see it but haven't yet. I haven't seen anything in the movie since Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017) to be honest. It's been too long. But, that's another great movie.
